title: Local VW Clubs for Local People...

posts.content:
Just so there is a 'hub' for these, I thought it would be good to list these threads here, and any others that crop up. Might be a good idea just to make this thread 'sticky' but carry on adding any other regions you like ...

Wirral And Northern Cheshire
viewtopic.php?f=2&t=73464

Devon and Cornwall.
viewtopic.php?f=2&t=73598

Doncaster VW owners club ...

viewtopic.php?f=2&t=74600

Great idea, here is our lillte local club.

Harrogate and District VW Club, www.hdvwclub.co.uk
We meet every first Sunday of the Month, 2pm at the royal Oak pub in Staveley near Knaresborough.

Yep, good idea. Here's one in Sussex, not really a "club" but everyone is welcome and we meet once a month.

www.horshamvwmeet.co.uk

Cheers

Nick

www.durhamdubbers.co.uk

Dun Cow.
Bournmoor
Primrose Hill
Houghton le Spring
DH4 6DY
0191 385 2631

Durham dubbers, for the north east of england, we have a monthly meet on 2nd sunday of the month
as well as additional midweek meets with another north east club

The north east VW club who cater for the teeside & cleveland area of the northeast

The is also the Angel VW club who are more northern, newcastle , shields area


all welcome, aircooled, any age, water cooled any age, owners and non owners, doesnt matter, as long as your into VW

Always good to give people the heads up to where their local club is and when/if they meet up as a lot of people haven't got the time to go searching out whats about I'm co-founder of The Old Volks Club in Bristol and we've been going for nearly 5 years yet it's amazing how many people come up to me at shows who want to join a club but don't know how to so giving people these different options and contacts can only be a good thing.

We have monthly club meets every second Sunday of the month at a local coffee shop as well as hitting the major shows and orgainising cruises and weekends away so people can get out and use their dubs check out the site at www.theoldvolksclub.co.uk

http://www.aircooledkonnection.com
Hampshire & Wiltshire VW owners club meet at the Weyhill Fair, Weyhill Road, Andover, Hampshire SP11 OPP usually 3rd Sunday of the month but always worth checking the forum as dates do vary.

Cheers

.....for those in Ireland


Dublin meet 1st wedsnesday of the month, 7.30pm in Stillorgan

N17 (west of Ireland) 1st saturday of month

Midlands meet, 3rd wednesday of month

other meets and events are put up as they happen

Times and locations can change from month to month so check on http://www.eircooled.com

these meets are mostly splits, bays & beetles but anything aircooled is welcome

HERTS VW CLUB www.hertsvwclub.org/
We have two meets per month

We meet on the 1st Tuesday of the month at;

The Two Chinmeys Pub
Stotfold Road
Letchworth
Hertfordshire
SG6 4JS

http://www.multimap.com/maps/?qs=SG6+4J ... tryCode=GB

AND...

We meet on the 2nd Tuesday of the month at the

Chequers Pub
Watling Street
Redbourn
St Albans
Hertfordshire
AL3 7AD

http://www.multimap.com/maps/?qs=AL3+7A ... tryCode=GB

The Pub is near Junction 9 of the M1 and has easy access from Luton, St Albans, Hemel Hempstead etc... We will be in the far corner of the pub... past the bar.

Please tell everyone you know and bring a friend... EVERYONE IS WELCOME ... Air and Water Cooled, shiny or Ratty... (you dont need to be a paid up member to visit us!)

Everyone is welcome - Join us!

Do any bus owners meet in or around the Manchester area?
Or is it really that bad up here............

Hi all,

I run a club called the Wolfsburg weed huggers....We have been going now for just shy of 15 years..

We meet in a little village called Penn street, at a pub called the Squirrel........We are also putting on our own little show called lazy sunday in the middle of April at said pub.

Most members come from, Amersham, Chesham, Beaconsfield, Aylesbury, Wycombe and Bucks area's.

We are having our next meet on the 29th of Feb, be great if anyone local could make it down...

Regards

Christian

samba freak wrote:Hi all,

I run a club called the Wolfsburg weed huggers....We have been going now for just shy of 15 years..

We meet in a little village called Penn street, at a pub called the Squirrel........We are also putting on our own little show called lazy sunday in the middle of April at said pub.

Most members come from, Amersham, Chesham, Beaconsfield, Aylesbury, Wycombe and Bucks area's.

Hello Christian

Not sure if I'd be able to make on 29th of Feb - do you know when your next meet is after that...?

Hey Blue Bullet Girl..........We normally meet from 8pm.....So if you can make it down on the 29th then see ya there.....

Failing that we usually meet on the last wednesday of each month......Do you know the squirrel?????

Look us up on facebook, as i keep the page updated with meet info, dates etc......

We are also putting on a mini show Mid April at the squirrel called Lazy Sunday...

Be great to see ya there...

Christian
Are there any groups meeting around Dartmoor or Exeter area?
As the weather is getting better wirral and nortern cheshire ass splitscreens should meet up again at the abbey vale again?
